H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3383.def: = river; ◄ flowing from Mount {L:Hermon<SDBH:חֶרְמֹון>} in a southerly direction through the {L:Sea of Galilee<SDBH:כִּנֶּרֶת>} into the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H8219.def: literally: the lowland; = the area situated between the {L:hill-country<SDBH:הַר>} and the coastal plain, which consists of foothills; named thus by the Israelites who occupied the hill-country; known for its {L:olive trees<SDBH:זַיִת>} and {L:sycamore trees<SDBH:שִׁקְמָה>}

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H4136.def: = relational linking an event to a location right in front of another location

H3844.def: = range of mountains; ◄ north of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ► known for the {L:cedar<SDBH:אֶרֶז>} and other trees growing there

H2850.def: = member of ethnic group inhabiting {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>} before arrival of {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; ◄ regarded as descendants of {L:Heth<SDBH:חֵת>}

H567.def: = member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H3669.def: = descendant of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}, son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}, son of {L:Noah<SDBH:נֹחַ>} and inhabitant of the country named after them

H6522.def: = member of ethnic group; ◄ original inhabitants of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H6908.def: = action by which humans or animals come together as a group for a common purpose

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H3898.def: = action by which humans ingest food

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H1391.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► one of the four {L:Hivite<SDBH:חִוִּי>} cities that made a covenant with {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H3405.def: = town; ◄ located northwest of the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}; territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first town conquered by {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} after they entered {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H6195.def: = state in which someone is able to manipulate difficult circumstances in such a way that the outcome is favorable to the planner; ≈ sometimes used in a positive sense, but also used in a negative sense

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H2543.def: = domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see {L:עַיִר<SDBH:עַיִר>}; female see {L:אָתֹון<SDBH:אָתֹון>}

H1087.def: = state in which objects have lost their quality and strength due to continued use; ≈ used figuratively to denote the loss of a person's vitality

H8242.def: = relatively large receptacle ◄ made out of leather or cloth; ► used for the storage and transportation of food and possibly other objects as well

H4997.def: = container ◄ made of a goatskin, the outer side of which has been turned inside; ► used for storing wine or milk

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H1234.def: = process by which an object is split, either partially or completely, either by supernatural means or by violence

H1087.def: = state in which objects have lost their quality and strength due to continued use; ≈ used figuratively to denote the loss of a person's vitality

H2921.def: = action by which a piece of cloth or leather is sewed on clothing or shoes ► in order to repair a hole or tear

H5275.def: = a covering for the foot ◄ usually made of leather or wood ► either  open and laced around the foot or ankle with a strap, or closed around the foot like a shoe

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H8008.def: = a long, flowing outer garment reaching to the feet; it was generally a loose-fitting cloth that was draped around the body and held in place in the middle by a sash wrapped around the waist or some means of fastening such as pins or buttons; it was worn at all levels of society, including also priests and other religious leaders; it served more purposes than just an outer covering; women sometimes carried bowls or other implements or grain in its folds; for poorer people it also served as a covering when sleeping

H6718.def: = action by which humans track and catch animals, ► usually to kill them for food

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H3001.def: = process by which objects containing liquid essential to their existence lose these liquids ◄ due to some external or internal cause

H5350.def: = a type of cake or pastry

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H4264.def: = open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

H1537.def: = ring or round disk with a rod (axle) running through its center or hub; either made of a solid piece of wood or a central hub connected with several spokes to an outer rim; ◄ made of wood and sometimes partly of iron; ► used to help vehicles move over the ground

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H6252.def: = town, possibly to be identified with {L:Beeshterah<SDBH:בְּעֶשְׁתְּרָה>}, {L:Ashteroth-Karnaim<SDBH:עַשְׁתְּרֹת קַרְנַיִם>} and {L:Karnaim<SDBH:קַרְנַיִם>}; ◄ territory of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, east of river {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}; ► former residence of king {L:Sihon<SDBH:סִיחֹון>} of {L:Heshbon<SDBH:חֶשְׁבֹּון>} and king {L:Og<SDBH:עֹוג>} of {L:Bashan<SDBH:בָּשָׁן>}; conquered by {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; assigned to clan of {L:Gershon<SDBH:גֵּרְשֹׁון>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H1391.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► one of the four {L:Hivite<SDBH:חִוִּי>} cities that made a covenant with {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H3716.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► one of the four {L:Hivite<SDBH:חִוִּי>} cities that made a covenant with {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H881.def: = town, possibly to be identified with {L:Beer<SDBH:בְּאֵר>}; ◄ territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► one of the four {L:Hivite<SDBH:חִוִּי>} cities that made a {L:covenant<SDBH:בְּרִית>} with {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H7157.def: = town, also known as {L:Kiriath-Baal<SDBH:קִרְיַת־בַּעַל>}, {L:Baalah<SDBH:בַּעֲלָה>}, and {L:Baale-Judah<SDBH:בַּעֲלֵי יְהוּדָה>}; ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► one of the four {L:Hivite<SDBH:חִוִּי>} cities that made a covenant with {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H2421.def: = process by which humans are alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H7411.def: = action by which humans cause (other) humans or objects to move in a particular direction, usually with force

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H779.def: = to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility, or because one was hired to do so

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3372.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
